name: The Expedition (knightlyLantern)
description:
Go into the Dark receses of the dungeon with your trusty expedition and claim the unknown in the name of the emperor! Gain achivements, summon mighty warirors but above all, keep moral high! The expedition must survive! FOR THE EMPEROR!!!

How To Play: The arms master in game tells you everything you need to know (The man in the management portion), but the quick and easy is: Play your heroes by clickin on them and then the board. Select them by clicking their space, which brings up their skill bar. Select the skill once to see its range and click again to perform the ability!

Controls: The entire game is played by using the mouse. Click on the character to play and the spot to play it. Click on the spawned character and chose its attack!
